channel.title: Gospel on Unghanekorets sangsamling

item.title: Will the Circle Be Unbroken
item.description: Noter: G-dur, 3-stemmigt 1. I was standing by my window, On one cold and cloudy day When I saw that hearse come rolling For to carry my mother away Omkv√¶d Will the circle be unbroken by and by, Lord, by and by There’s a better home a-waiting in the sky, Lord, in the sky 2. I said to that undertaker undertaker please drive slow for this lady you are carrying
